inclusion.criterion: Primary tumor greater than (>) 2 cm in diameter
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Metastatic disease (Stage IV) or bilateral breast cancer
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Prior breast or non-breast malignancy within 5 years prior to study entry
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has Turner syndrome, obesity, and mental retardation. She is treating with GH without estrogen therapy.
